Rules: Gain 1 Power Token per success.

Name: NOVA SPARK!
Rules: X=the Fire in your Cooldown Meter. Remove X Fire from your Cooldown Meter to Trigger: Inflict X Fire to your opponent.

Name: PLASMA SHOOTER!
DamageString: Inflict damage. You may place X Attack Cards into your Cooldown Meter, Deactivated, to Trigger: Inflict +X⋅1/2 damage.

Name: RAZING BOLT!
Requirements: All opponents within range of this Attack must perform a Recovery Roll. On a success, they are immune to any damage caused by this Attack.
DamageString: Inflict damage to all hexes adjacent to you. Inflict +2 damage to opponents at a higher Tier

Name: RAZING STORM!
Requirements: If played in a Combo, ignore this card's Trigger.
Rules: Per success, you may Create 1 Inferno on your Target's hex or a hex adjacent to your Target. Whenever this Attack is successful, Trigger: You may play this Attack for free against 1 new Target.

Name: SOL SPHERE!
Rules: X=the Fire in both you and your opponent's Cooldown Meter. Increase X cards in your opponent's Cooldown Meter to their Cooldown Slot 3.

Name: TRI-CHOGOKING BEAM!
Rules: If this Attack is successful, Trigger: You may play this Attack for free against 1 new Target, once.

Name: TURBINE FIST!
Rules: You may increase or decrease 1 card in your Cooldown Meter by 1 Cooldown Slot.
